Class Triangle

java.lang.Object
Triangle
public class Triangle extends Object
A Triangle with three integer lengths
Author:
mdixon

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Triangle()
    Constructor Creates an equilateral triangle with all sides set to 1
    Triangle(int length)
    Constructor Creates an equilateral triangle with all sides set to the given length
    Triangle(int a, int b, int c)
    Constructor Creates a triangle with each side set to a given value.

    Calculates the average length of the sides.

    Calculates the total length of all the sides.

    An Equilateral triangle is a triangle which has three equal length sides.

  • Method Details

    • isIsosceles

      public boolean isIsosceles()
      An Isosceles triangle is a triangle which has two equal length sides.
      Returns:
      true if the triangle is isosceles

    • isEquilateral

      public boolean isEquilateral()
      An Equilateral triangle is a triangle which has three equal length sides.
      Returns:
      true if the triangle is equilateral

    • isScalene

      public boolean isScalene()
      A scalene triangle is a triangle in which all three sides are in different lengths.
      Returns:
      true if the triangle is scalene

    • setSides

      public void setSides(int a, int b, int c)
      Sets each side of the triangle to a given value.
      Parameters:
      a - length of side A
      b - length of side B
      c - length of side C

    • setSides

      public void setSides(int length)
      Sets the triangle to be equilateral with all sides set to the given length
      Parameters:
      length - the length of side A, B and C

    • setSides

      public void setSides(int length, int other)
      Sets the triangle to be scalene with two sides set to the same value.
      Parameters:
      length - the length of side A, B
      other - the length of side C

    • copy

      public Triangle copy()
      Creates and returns a copy of the triangle. Changing the side lengths of the copy will not effect the original triangle.
      Returns:
      a copy of the Triangle

      public int getPerimeter()
      Calculates the total length of all the sides.
      Returns:
      the total length of all the sides.

    • getAverageLength

      public int getAverageLength()
      Calculates the average length of the sides.
      Returns:
